name: Garlic Soup
hint: Garnish with bacon, olive oil and parsley. The egg white can also be added
preparation: Cut the garlic. Peel and cut the potato in cubes
Sauté the garlic and potato. Add the laurier leaf and pepper.
Deglaze with the stock
Cook the soup with the lit until done
Remove the leaf and blend
Bind the soup with the egg yolk

name: Tom kha gai
hint: The herbs are meant for infusion only and not meant to be eaten. Please inform your guests or remove them before serving
preparation: Bring chicken stock to a boil, then add salt and bite sized chicken. Let simmer gently for 20 minutes or until chicken is fork tender
Add coconut milk, lemongrass(2 cm pieces of bottom half, bruised), galangal, kaffir lime leaves(roughly torn), chilies(bruised), half the fish sauce, and palm sugar. Simmer for 3-5 minutes to infuse.
Add mushrooms, bring back to a simmer and cook for 1-2 minutes or until cooked through.
Taste and add more fish sauce as needed. Turn off the heat and add lime juice.
Kin khao hai aroy! (Enjoy your meal!)

name: Spicy tomato stew
hint: Add cornstarch if it is too liquid
ingredients: 500 g of new potatoes with skin
preparation: Heat up a dutch oven and bake the bacon crispy
Deglaze the bacon with water
Add the potatoes and carrots in pieces and cook for 10 minutes
Add the tomato cubes and stir well
Bring to flavor with paprika powder, white pepper, sriracha sauce and oregano
Add the diced bell pepper and heat it for a few minutes

name: El diablo
hint: Garnish: lime wedge and fresh blackberry or candied ginger (optional)
preparation: Combine all ingredients, except ginger beer, and shake
Fine-strain into an ice-filled glass
Top with ginger beer and garnish

name: Cauliflower with salsa verde
hint: delicious with a pork chop and baby potatoes
ingredients: 5 spoons of extra virgin olive oil
preparation: Divide the cauliflower into florets and cook for 5 minutes until al dente
Meanwhile, put the garlic with the capers, pickles, parsley, mustard, vinegar, oil and basil in a blender. Blend to a smooth sauce. Season with pepper and salt
Put the cauliflower in a bowl and pour the salsa verde over it

name: Creamy carrot and parm pasta
hint: if sauce is too thick thin using reserved pasta water. If not thick enough add additional sauce
preparation: Preheat oven to 400 degrees
Onto a rimmed baking sheet place: carrots, bell pepper, garlic. Drizzle oil on top. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to coat. Bake for approximately 25-30 minutes
When bell pepper is cool enough to handle, remove skin and seeds (discard)
Place a large pot of generously salted water onto boil. When boiling, add pasta and cook until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water before draining
Into blender add: roasted carrots, bell pepper and garlic. Start by adding 1 cup broth and pulse until pureed
Continue adding broth until you have a creamy consistency. Season with salt and pepper to taste
Into a large serving bowl add cooked pasta and 1 cup carrot sauce. Toss to coat. TIP: if sauce is too thick thin using reserved pasta water. If not thick enough add additional sauce
Garnish with Parmigiano shavings, fresh thyme and crispy bacon if desired

name: Creamy nutella vodka
hint: This recipe results in ~1L of creamy nutella vodka
preparation: In a pot, combine nutella and sugar and turn on low heat. Slowly add heavy whipping cream and vodka, stirring frequently
After cooling, pour mix into a bottle and serve in shot glass
Top with whipped cream and garnish with a strawberry
[Drink responsibly!]

name: Stew with blade steak and mushrooms
hint: Add cornstarch if it is too liquid
preparation: Melt the butter in a dutch oven an bake the blade steak all around
Finely chop the onion and garlic and add it. Deglaze with bouillon
Pour in the red wine and bring to taste with thyme
Bring it slowly to a boil and let it simmer for 2.5 h
Add the peas and mushrooms and cook for a few minutes

name: Shakshuka
hint: Add a can of tomatoes and bring to taste accordingly
preparation: Cut the onions into slices and the bell peppers into strips. Cut the thyme and parsley. Also cut half of the coriander. Cut the tomatoes coarsely
Roast the cumin seeds for around 2 minutes on high heat
. Add the oil and onions and bake them for 5 minutes
Add the bell peppers, sugar, parsley, coriander, thyme, bay leaves and bake for 5-10 minutes on high heat, until the vegetables have a nice color
Add the tomatoes, saffron, cayenne pepper and a bit of salt and pepper. Turn down the heat and let it simmer for 15 minutes. Keep adding water so it keeps the consistency of pasta sauce

Remove the bay leaves and divide over 2 frying pans. Make 4 cavities into each pan and put an egg in each. Add salt on the eggs and put a lit on the pan for 10- 12 minutes, until the eggs are just cooked
. Sprinkle with the remaining coriander and serve
Enjoy your meal!

name: Sweet and sour cucumber
hint: The star anise only adds to the recipe if it stays in for a while
preparation: Cut the onion and cucumber in thin slices
Mix everything together in a bowl

name: Ciabatta with chicken and tomatoes out of the oven
preparation: Heat the oven to 200 degrees
Cut the chicken in parts
Cut the onions and tomatoes in parts
Divide over the baking plate and sprinkle with the herbs and oil
Put the baking plate in the oven for 15 minutes
Mix the content and add the sliced ciabatta
Put it back in the oven for another 15 minutes
Serve with the rucola added on top and add salt and pepper to taste

name: Bulgur salad with peas and mint
hint: For a gluten free version the bulgur can be swapped with cooked quinoa. The pomegranate can be swapped with roasted sunflower seeds and cut dried apricots and raisins
preparation: Put the peas with the salt in a pan of boiling water, let it boil for a few minutes and drain the water
Put the bulgur in a bowl and add a layer of lauw water and let it rest for 30-60 minutes until the bulgur gets soft. Drain the water afterwards
In the meantime, cut the leaves of mint and parsley finely
Place the peas in a bowl of ice water to schik them, to let them remain a nice green color
With a fork and mix in the salt and pepper. In this phase the bulgur and peas are edible for a day if they are placed in a fridge
Add the herbs, peas, oil and vinegar to the bulgur. Taste test it and add pomegranate seeds afterwards

name: Spinach and pesto white lasagna
ingredients: 8 oz of sliced baby bella mushrooms
preparation: Preheat a oven to 350 Fahrenheit. Grease a baking pan
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms; cook 4 to 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden. Transfer to a plate

Add butter to a pan. Once melted, whisk flour for 30 seconds. Gradually stream in milk, whisking continuously until combined. Whisk in broth and bring mixture to a boil; reduce to a simmer and cook 2 to 3 minutes, whisking occasionally, until mixture is thickened. Stir in salt, pepper and half of the parmesan. Cook 1 additional minute, until cheese melts. Set cheese sauce asside
In a large bowl, combine spinach, pesto and ricotta; stir well

Spread half of the cheese sauce on the bottom of a prepared baking dish. Top with 3 lasagna sheets. Spread one third of the ricotta mixture and half of the mushrooms over lasagna sheets. Spoon one fourth of the remaining cheese sauce on overtop. Place another 3 lasagna sheets on top and repeat with layers of ricoota mushrooms and cheese sauce. Repeat once more with the exception of the mushrooms, ending with 3 lasagna sheets. Spoon remaining cheese sauce on top. Sprinkle remaining parmesan on top. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes, until golden and bubbly

name: Budae Jjigae (Army Stew)
hint: Noodles soak up a lot of liquid so it’s best to consume them first. Also, you can replenish with spare stock (if you have any) as it boils down. It should be still delicious. (& this is how Koreans eat this dish at a restaurant.)
ingredients: 150 g of thinly sliced franfurter sausages
200 g of thinly sliced enoki mushrooms
200 g of thinly sliced king oyster mushrooms
100 g of thinly sliced shiitake mushrooms
50 g of korean rice cakes for soup
S few sprinkles of ground black pepper
preparation: Assemble the main ingredients (except for instant ramen noodles, rice cakes, green onion and cheese) in a shallow pot. Add the sauce in the middle. Pour the stock in the corner of the pot. Close the lid and boil it on medium high heat until the stock starts to boil (about 8 mins).

Add the remaining ingredients – instant ramen noodles, rice cakes, green onion and cheese on top of the pot and boil uncovered until the noodles are cooked (about 2 to 3 mins). Reduce the heat to low (if you’re cooking on a portable burner and sharing the food at the dinning table).
Start dishing out soup, protein and vegetables onto your own soup bowl. Serve with steamed rice (& with other Korean side dishes).

name: Lemongrass & ginger liqueur
preparation: Put all the ingredients in a preserving jar
Stir the jar a few times during the first few days to dissolve the sugar
Store the jar in a dark cool place for 4 weeks
Filter the liqueur with a coffee filter and put it in a bottle

name: honey ginger liqueur
preparation: Put all the ingredients in a preserving jar
Stir the jar a few times during the first few days to dissolve the sugar
Store the jar in a dark cool place for 4 weeks
Filter the liqueur with a small sieve

name: Lady dream
hint: The edge of the glas can also be garnished with sugar after smearing a slice of orange on it.
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain it in a martini glass. It can also be  poured in another glass with ice.

name: Color changing frozen mojito
preparation: [Beforehand]
Add water and red cabbage to a medium-size pot. Bring the water to a boil,  then strain the cabbage in a sieve over a bowl to reserve the blue liquid.
Pour the strained blue water into an ice tray. You will be left with 1 cup (235 ml) of blue water. Reserve the water and freeze the ice tray for 6 hours, or  overnight.
Add the reserved blue water to a pot with the sugar and bring to a boil until the  sugar has dissolved. Set aside.
Combine the lime juice with 1½ (355 ml) cups of water and stir to combine.  Pour the lime mixture into an ice tray and freeze for 6 hours, up to overnight.
[Building the cocktail]
Add the blue ice cubes to a blender and blend until finely crushed. Put the  crushed blue ice in a glass.
Wash the blender well.
Add the lime ice cubes and 8 mint leaves. Blend until finely crushed. Put the  crushed lime and mint ice on top of the blue ice.
Slowly pour the white rum and blue simple syrup. Top with a sprig of mint.
[Enjoy!]

name: Mexican coffee
ingredients: 1 scoop vanilla ice cream or whipped cream
preparation: Pour all ingredients in a cup and add a scoop of vanilla ice cream or whipped cream on top.

name: Irish coffee
ingredients: 1 scoop vanilla ice cream or whipped cream
preparation: Pour all ingredients in a cup and add a scoop of vanilla ice cream or whipped cream on top.

name: Italian coffee
ingredients: 1 scoop vanilla ice cream or whipped cream
preparation: Pour all ingredients in a cup and add a scoop of vanilla ice cream or whipped cream on top.

name: Beetroot daiquiri
preparation: [Beforehand]
Take 400ml of beetroot juice and put juice in a pan.
Add 400g of white caster sugar, heat gently & stir until the sugar is completely dissolved. Once the sugar is dissolved remove from the heat, allow to cool and bottle.
[Building the cocktail]
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker, fill with cubed ice and shake vigorously for 10-12 seconds.
Strain into a rocks glass over ice.
Garnish with a slice of beet root or a slice of lime.

name: Ginger shandy beer cocktail
preparation: Cut half of the lime in wedges and squeeze the other half
Divide the ginger syrup and lime juice between the glasses. Mix with a spoon or pestle.
Put the ice cubes in a clean tea towel and beat small, for example with a hammer. Divide the ice between the glasses.
Divide the ginger ale and beer between the glasses and stir.
Place 2 lime wedges in each glass and serve with a straw and a pestle.
